llama2:70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 25th): Chicago to Boise

* Depart from Chicago and fly to Boise, Idaho (Flight Number F3857813 or F3857845)
* Check into accommodations in Boise (Sunny & Spacious 2 bdrm apt or Private Suite)
* Visit the World Center for Birds of Prey (optional)
* Dine at The Flying Pie (Italian) or P.F. Chang's (Chinese)

Day 2 (March 26th): Boise

* Explore the Idaho State Capitol Building and the Boise River Greenbelt
* Visit the Old Idaho Penitentiary (optional)
* Dine at The Filling Station (Italian) or Happy Wok (Chinese)

Day 3 (March 27th): Boise to Pocatello

* Drive from Boise to Pocatello, Idaho (self-driving or taxi)
* Visit the Pocatello Zoo (optional)
* Dine at The Bridge (Italian) or Great Wall Chinese Restaurant (Chinese)

Day 4 (March 28th): Pocatello

* Explore the Idaho Museum of Natural History (optional)
* Visit the Fort Hall Replica (optional)
* Dine at Joe's Farm Grill (Italian) or China Garden (Chinese)

Day 5 (March 29th): Pocatello to Idaho Falls

* Drive from Pocatello to Idaho Falls, Idaho (self-driving or taxi)
* Visit the Idaho Falls Zoo (optional)
* Dine at The Sandpiper (Italian) or Wok This Way (Chinese)

Day 6 (March 30th): Idaho Falls

* Explore the Idaho Falls Greenbelt Trail System (optional)
* Visit the Museum of Idaho (optional)
* Dine at The Flying Squash (Italian) or China Kitchen (Chinese)

Day 7 (March 31st): Idaho Falls to Chicago

* Depart from Idaho Falls and fly back to Chicago, Illinois (Flight Number F3864597)
* Dine at The Bistro (Italian) or P.F. Chang's (Chinese) in the airport before departing

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights from Chicago to Boise and Idaho Falls to Chicago: $4,160
* Accommodations for 8 travelers in Boise, Pocatello, and Idaho Falls: $7,520
* Transportation (self-driving or taxi) from Boise to Pocatello and Pocatello to Idaho Falls: $18
* Food and dining expenses for 8 travelers for 7 days: $6,540
* Total budget: $22,200

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate and can vary based on individual preferences and exchange rates.

This travel plan includes visits to various attractions in Boise, Pocatello, and Idaho Falls, as well as Italian and Chinese dining options for each city. The budget breakdown provides an estimate of the costs for flights, accommodations, transportation, and food expenses.
